nodes.name: Customer-Complaints-Data
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Infer the schema when a new file is selected or the file content has changed

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.name: mode
fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.name: addInputFileName
fields.title: Whether to Add Input File Name as Column in the Dataframe

fields.name: encoding
fields.title: Encoding
fields.description: Decodes the CSV files by the given encoding type

fields.name: quote
fields.title: Quote
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

fields.name: escape
fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: extraOptionsKeys
fields.title: Properties Name
fields.description: Extra options/properites available while executing in Read CSV.

fields.name: extraOptionsValues
fields.title: Properties Value
fields.description: Config Values for the Corresponding properites name

nodes.name: Clustering
nodes.description: K-means clustering with support for k-means initialization proposed by Bahmani et al

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: modelIdentifier
fields.title: Model Identifier
fields.description: modelIdentifier starts with $loop & columns names separated with underscore. Example: $loop_columnName1_columnName2.

fields.name: featuresCol
fields.title: Features Column
fields.description: Features column of type vectorUDT for model fitting.

fields.name: k
fields.title: K
fields.description: The number of clusters to create.

fields.name: predictionCol
fields.title: Prediction Column
fields.description: The prediction column created during model scoring.

fields.name: tol
fields.title: Tolerence
fields.description: The convergence tolerance for iterative algorithms.

fields.name: initSteps
fields.title: initSteps
fields.description: The number of steps for the k-means initialization mode. It will be ignored when other initialization modes are chosen.

nodes.name: Prediction
nodes.description: Predict node takes in a DataFrame and Model and makes predictions

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

nodes.name: Print N Rows
nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame. It is useful for seeing intermediate output

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: n
fields.title: Num Rows to Print
fields.description: number of rows to be printed

nodes.name: Vector Assembler
nodes.description: Merges multiple columns into a vector column.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: inputCols
fields.title: Input Columns
fields.description: Input column of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: handleInvalid
fields.title: Handle Invalid
fields.description: How to handle invalid data (NULL values). Options are 'skip' (filter out rows with invalid data), 'error' (throw an error), or 'keep' (return relevant number of NaN in the output).

nodes.name: Remove Temporary Embedding Column
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by dropping the specified columns

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: dropCols
fields.title: Columns
fields.description: The columns to be excluded from the output DataFrame

nodes.name: Map Prediction to Complaint Category
nodes.description: This node creates a new Dataframe with a new column appended to it containing value based on the condition met

fields.name: storageLevel

fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: values
fields.value: ["'Login / portal related issues'","'Technical issues'","'Suspicious (Hidden charges/fraud activity)'"]

nodes.name: Sort By
nodes.description: It sorts the incoming DataFrame on the fields specified.

fields.description: Whether to sort in ascending or descending order

fields.name: comment

fields.title: Comment

nodes.name: Save Parquet
nodes.description: Saves the DataFrame into the specified location in Parquet Format. When running on Hadoop, it is saved onto HDFS.

fields.title: Path
fields.description: Path where to save the Parquet files

fields.title: Save Mode
fields.description: Whether to Append, Overwrite or Error if the path Exists

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Output Column Names, default value is aggregateOperation_aggregateCol.

fields.name: whereClause
fields.title: Where Clause
fields.description: where condition before group by function

fields.name: havingClause
fields.title: Having Clause
fields.description: having condition after group by function
